questions.name: Project or Portfolio Name
questions.value: Abyra Group Inc. Solar Project - Phase 2

questions.name: Company Description
questions.value: Abyra Group Inc. is a Texas-based corporation specializing in renewable energy development and implementation. The company focuses on commercial solar installations and energy efficiency solutions for industrial facilities. Founded in 2019, Abyra Group has completed multiple solar projects across Texas and is expanding its renewable energy portfolio through strategic financing partnerships.

questions.name: Use of Funds
questions.value: Proceeds will be used to complete the 687.5 kW rooftop solar installation at our San Benito facility. Funds will cover final equipment procurement ($800K), installation labor ($550K), electrical infrastructure upgrades ($200K), permits and inspections ($50K), and working capital ($150K) until REAP grant reimbursement and ITC monetization.

questions.name: Project Timeline
questions.value: Construction completion within 6 months of funding. REAP grant reimbursement expected within 90 days of project completion. ITC monetization anticipated within 12 months.

questions.name: Regulatory Approvals
questions.value: SEC Form D filed on June 15, 2025 (Accession Number: 0001234567-25-000001). Texas PUC interconnection agreement executed. USDA REAP grant award letter dated March 1, 2025 for $999,871. Local building permits approved by Cameron County. Environmental clearance completed with no adverse findings.

questions.name: Project Description
questions.value: Abyra Group Inc. is developing a 687.5 kW rooftop solar photovoltaic system on its manufacturing facility in San Benito, Texas. The project will offset approximately 75% of the facility's annual electricity consumption, generating estimated annual savings of $83,000. The system utilizes high-efficiency monocrystalline panels with power optimizers and will be interconnected under a net metering agreement with the local utility. Engineering and design are complete, with installation scheduled to begin upon funding closure.

questions.name: Business Description
questions.value: Abyra Group Inc. operates a 50,000 square foot manufacturing facility producing specialized industrial equipment for the oil and gas sector. The company has been profitable for the past three years with annual revenues of approximately $8.5 million. Management seeks to reduce operational costs through renewable energy adoption while supporting corporate sustainability goals.

questions.name: Escrow Agent
questions.value: Texas Title Company, San Benito Branch

metadata.processingNotes: All Phase 2 requirements satisfied. Ready for document generation and SEC filing preparation.
